item.description:
Jaffrey is closing for the season after this weekend...

I'll make the short hop Wednesday night for a Lobstah Roll and some of those awesome Pepper Rings.... Anyone interested?

We need to leave at 5 or so in order to obey AFN's rules on being out by sunset. 6:10 the latest off the field... Maybe we might want to go elsewhere for a dessert????

So if anyone is interested, here we go.... See you all tonight at the meeting...

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Last Chance for the year at Jaffrey
